title: Ep. 20 - The Duchess Deal by Tessa Dare (PART 2)
itunes:title: Ep. 20 - The Duchess Deal by Tessa Dare (PART 2)
description:
In this episode, we finish up The Duchess Deal by Tessa Dare. There's theater, rain, a jailbreak, redemption, and SEX. YES PLEASE. 
 Bonus Content: Does Melody know what animals are? Or sounds? What's in her head? 
 Self love recommendations: 
 Erin: "You have to give up being perfect to be good, and give up being good to be free." Let that wash over you. 
  
 Melody: When Things Fall Apart: Heart Advice for Difficult Times by Pema Chodron
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
